page.title: 10Hartlepool Public Transport
page.content: National Express is largely responsible for the long distance services of these companies. With the exception of Hartlepool Borough Transport, Trimdon Motor Services and Cleveland Transit, all are a part of the National Bus Company but each is completely autonimous. Hartlepool has several private coach operators who provide a service for social and works transport. The main companies are:- Beeline Tours Ltd., Bensway Travel, Hart Coaches, P&E coaches, and P&R coaches. The coaches can be hired by private groups for social outings; factories to transport their employees to and from works and educaional establishments for transporting pupils on school visits.
